name: CoreCare
headline: Helping healthcare providers reduce administrative costs using AI
description:
CoreCare is the leading AI-powered workflow platform helping Post-Acute and Long-Term Care (PALTC) providers achieve operational excellence. Trusted by 1,000+ locations nationwide, CoreCare increases admissions, optimizes reimbursement rates, improves collection metrics, and reduces administrative burdens—all on one intuitive platform.

At the heart of CoreCare is Collaborative Revenue Management, which unites essential data and teams on a shared platform. Our approach empowers employees—regardless of skill or tenure—to perform like experts from day one, collaborate with their peers on critical work, and give management unmatched visibility into performance across the organization.

CoreCare replaces error-prone spreadsheets and fragmented portals with streamlined workflows that drive measurable results. Trusted by leading providers, CoreCare redefines how teams work and sets a new standard for AI in long-term care.
tags: industry:b2b; industry:workflow-automation; industry:enterprise-software; industry:healthcare-it; industry:ai; location:new-york

founders.name: Mehrdad Shafaie, Founder
founders.description: I get excited about solving really hard problems in payments and money movement.

founders.name: Dennis Antonelos, Cofounder & CEO
founders.description: Always running towards the big, complicated problems. I love creating high quality software products for customers that 10x how employees and teams work, and make a big impact on critical business metrics.

raw_markdown='##  Schedule Demo 
Interested in learning more about CoreCare? Please fill out the form below and one of our team members will be in touch! 
[![CoreCare logo](https://corecare.ai/_nuxt/img/logo.a040df9.svg)](https://corecare.ai/</>)
[About Us](https://corecare.ai/</about>)
[ Login ](https://corecare.ai/<https:/dashboard.corecare.io>)
Schedule Demo 
[![CoreCare logo](https://corecare.ai/_nuxt/img/logo.a040df9.svg)](https://corecare.ai/</>)
![Hamburger](https://corecare.ai)
BUILT FOR LONG-TERM CARE
##  The **#1 AI-powered** workflow solution for **Collaborative Revenue Management**
Revenue is a team sport, but your EHR wasn’t built for collaboration. CoreCare is used by nursing homes across the country to unite admissions, revenue cycle, business office, and clinical leaders onto a single platform for reimbursement, compliance, and collections. 
Request a Demo ![Arrow](https://corecare.ai)
![](https://corecare.ai/_nuxt/img/banner-illustration.28707cb.png)
OUR PRODUCTS
![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/ZzSPG68jQArT0zAh_admit.jpg?auto=format,compress)
Ensure that every admission is compliant and set up for success with CoreCare Admit. Review all your admitted residents on a single dashboard, along with their PASRR information, authorizations, and required forms. The system lets you track status, due dates, and submission dates, and proactively alerts you of missing or incomplete requirements. Teams can collaborate to proactively address issues to avoid lapses in compliance that negatively impact revenue.
![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/ZzSPHK8jQArT0zAi_revenue.jpg?auto=format,compress)
Eliminate spreadsheets and supercharge business office workflows with CoreCare Revenue. The platform automatically runs eligibility and benefits and identifies changes and data discrepancies, ensuring that teams can collaborate to fix issues before claims are submitted. Automatically track Medicaid applications, renewals, and compliance forms for better visibility, allowing revenue teams to work together for faster approvals, enhanced cash flow, and reduced risk.
![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/ZzSPGq8jQArT0zAg_clinical.jpg?auto=format,compress)
Take the guesswork out of complex reporting and decisioning for clinical teams with CoreCare Clinical. The product automatically tracks MDS assessments, state forms, and levels of care while empowering your clinical staff to make the best decisions to optimize reimbursement. The result is reduced payment delays from overdue forms or mismatched data, and maximum revenue based on insights from your clinical data.
## CoreCare **delivers a big ROI** making your team more productive and improving your cash flow.
### Shorten time on Medicaid pending by up to 50%
Demonstrable before-and-after improvement of average number of days on Medicaid pending, accelerating cash flow.
### Eliminate up to 99% of missed renewals and missed forms
Every missed renewal is a new Medicaid pending case, and every missed form means a delay in collections or worse. CoreCare ensures nothing is missed, keeping you in compliance, your residents billable and your cash flow healthy.
### Instant alerts on new approvals for 10x faster billing
Nursing home staff takes 14-28 days on average to identify a new Medicaid approval manually - CoreCare alerts your team instantly when Medicaid is approved, allowing you to bill immediately and collect faster.
### Unprecedented visibility & tracking
Ability to view and track mission-critical workflows like never before, enabling managers and executives to easily understand the big picture, be proactive instead of reactive and get in front of any potential risks before they can impact cash flow.
### Save 1,000s of hours per year
Having data in one, single location saves your team from having to juggle multiple portals and spreadsheets, and allows for powerful automations like in-platform document capture, information collection, document transmission, benefits and eligibility monitoring, and more!
Schedule Demo 
![](https://corecare.ai/_nuxt/img/steps-image.203ece8.png)
## CoreCare integrates **instantly and securely** with your existing EHR/EMRs and State Medicaid systems.
![Systems illustration](https://corecare.ai/_nuxt/img/systems-mobile.b2f9e42.png)
## Trusted by **top long-term care teams** across the country.
Over 600 nursing homes in 10 states use CoreCare to **say goodbye to spreadsheets** and **streamline their operations** - saving time, boosting cash flow and **driving healthy financial performance**. 
![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/3012f1b6-aa1a-4dce-a565-e12879a02286_advanced.png?auto=compress,format)![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/34062ef3-2db2-4b32-a121-dd4e79e547be_Creativecrop.png?auto=compress,format)![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/33712fb2-b9a7-4fce-94ca-03b6992ef760_focused.png?auto=compress,format)![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/caa3682f-2994-4918-b862-871f6a30ff44_Legacy+Health+Services.png?auto=compress,format)![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/5f9afec1-75fb-4af0-8b29-1fc46b00d365_summit.png?auto=compress,format)![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/57576d67-033d-43ca-8df2-6a62b5c547c5_touchstone.png?auto=compress,format)![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/4dde15d7-712f-4fd4-b8c0-8e9f968e85a6_united.png?auto=compress,format)![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/d6fa33a7-5b38-4df9-ab91-7310b3c9612f_logo+%281%29.png?auto=compress,format)![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/e376397f-9835-4c78-8943-0c6a1b54858c_fundamental.png?auto=compress,format)![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/b5c6b285-c7b6-4ba5-82bc-f2e0b1f29ba3_regency.png?auto=compress,format)![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/77d029f3-208e-440b-a012-e7f20c7283a4_gulfcoast.png?auto=compress,format)![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/d3ce8f7b-6305-4afa-bae3-330de84ce448_slp.png?auto=compress,format)
Schedule Demo ![Arrow](https://corecare.ai)
Here’s what CoreCare clients have to say about their experiences:
![Quote](https://corecare.ai)
"The results of our work with CoreCare’s software are in, and the effect on our bottom line has been outstanding. We have been able to streamline our entire billing process, reduce admin costs, shorten the number of accounts receivable (AR) days and free up cash for growth. Every healthcare provider should work with CoreCare!"
Gary Blake
CEO, Creative Solutions
![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/5ee88e1f-4e59-4597-87e7-2b12a8e809d5_creative.png?auto=compress,format)
![Quote](https://corecare.ai)
"CoreCare has been a critical asset during the transition from MITS to PNM. While the new Medicaid system experienced outages, CoreCare enabled us to review the information we needed in a timely manner to accurately verify Medicaid eligibility and liability."
Tammy Brubaker
Director of Revenue Cycle
![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/4dde15d7-712f-4fd4-b8c0-8e9f968e85a6_united.png?auto=compress,format)
![Quote](https://corecare.ai)
"When I was introduced to CoreCare and the functionalities they are creating for our industry, I thought ‘finally someone made my dream come true’ & ‘this is a million-dollar invention’. I thank you guys for getting a great team together and sharing this product with us. Amazing!!!!!"
Jeannie Carlson
VP of Revenue Reimbursement
![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/27a312b0-45d3-4aaf-b6e6-c11a8cafbd2a_focused-alt.png?auto=compress,format)
![Quote](https://corecare.ai)
"When I was introduced to CoreCare and the functionalities they are creating for our industry, I thought ‘finally someone made my dream come true’ & ‘this is a million-dollar invention’. I thank you guys for getting a great team together and sharing this product with us. Amazing!!!!!"
Jeannie Carlson
VP of Revenue Reimbursement
![](https://images.prismic.io/corecare-v2/27a312b0-45d3-4aaf-b6e6-c11a8cafbd2a_focused-alt.png?auto=compress,format)
![Quote](https://corecare.ai)
"The results of our work with CoreCare’s software are in, and the effect on our bottom line has been outstanding. We have been able to streamline our entire billing process, reduce admin costs, shorten the number of accounts receivable (AR) days and free up cash for growth. Every healthcare provider should work with CoreCare!"
Gary Blake

generated_description:
**CoreCare: Revolutionizing Post-Acute and Long-Term Care Operations**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from the vibrant tech ecosystem of New York, CoreCare is a trailblazer in the healthcare technology space. As a Y Combinator Batch S20 company, they are dedicated to helping healthcare providers streamline operations and cut administrative costs through the power of artificial intelligence.

At its core, CoreCare is an AI-driven workflow platform designed specifically for Post-Acute and Long-Term Care (PALTC) providers. With over 1,000 locations across the United States trusting their solution, CoreCare elevates operational efficiency by enhancing admissions, optimizing reimbursement processes, and reducing the administrative load on healthcare teams. This allows providers to focus on what really matters—patient care.

CoreCare introduces **Collaborative Revenue Management**, a pioneering approach that integrates vital data and teams into one unified platform. This empowers employees of all skill levels to collaborate effectively, driving productivity from day one. Management, in turn, gains unprecedented visibility into performance metrics across the organization, allowing for informed, proactive decision-making.

The platform effectively replaces error-prone spreadsheets and disjointed management systems with optimized workflows that deliver tangible results. Key features include:

1. **CoreCare Admit**: Ensures compliance for every admission while providing real-time tracking and alerts for required forms and authorizations.
   
2. **CoreCare Revenue**: Automates the verification of eligibility and benefits, minimizes data discrepancies, and streamlines compliance to enhance cash flow and expedite approvals.

3. **CoreCare Clinical**: Simplifies MDS assessments and state form tracking, empowering clinical staff to optimize revenue through data-driven insights.

The results speak for themselves. CoreCare can reduce the time spent on Medicaid pending cases by up to 50%, eliminate missed renewals and forms effectively, and provide actionable insights to improve cash flow. With an integrated system that works seamlessly with existing EHRs and state Medicaid systems, CoreCare is fast becoming the go-to platform for nursing homes looking to improve financial performance and operational efficiency.

With just a team of 11, CoreCare is already making a monumental impact in the healthcare industry. They’ve got backing from influential figures, including Group Partner Dalton Caldwell, and their client testimonials echo the transformative impact of their services.

For those in the healthcare sector looking to liberate themselves from cumbersome workflows and embrace the future, CoreCare is not just an option; it’s a necessity. By leveraging AI technology, they are redefining standards within long-term care and proving that innovation can lead to improved outcomes for both providers and patients alike.

For more details, you can visit their website: [CoreCare](https://corecare.ai).
